g.title: cluster_jibri_fosdem_org
g.text: convert jitsi rooms into rtmp video stream

a.xlink:title:
\<talk_id_or_slug\>-backstage#chat.fosdem.org
matrix room
builtin jitsi video chat
invite only
opens up after q\&a
general FOSDEM public matrix rooms\ninfodesk, video, ...
<track>-backstage#chat.fosdem.org\nprivate matrix room\njitsi might come in handy

g.title: matrix_room_talk_backstage->audience
